item.title: Challenging the Testing Pyramid
item.description: Writing automated tests has become like a standard practice in software development and (should be) an integral part of a healthy software development process. Testing (in particular automated testing) can come with different flavors and at different levels. In this article I’d like to provide a quick overview of automated UI or end-2-end testing with Cypress.

item.title: Setup your Workstation for JavaScript Development
item.description: You want to learn about modern web development with JavaScript? Maybe Angular? Well, then it’s time to get you setup properly to get started. In this article we’ll go through some of the tools.

item.title: Learning Angular: Conditionally add styles to an element
item.description: Here we're going through a couple of ways to conditionally apply some styles to a DOM element in Angular. (adsbygoogle = window.

item.title: HTML5 vs Android: Apps or Web for mobile development??
item.description: This is a hotly discussed topic recently. The web is now a fully-capable platform and it's getting better and better as the HTML5 standard advances.
